If not, see . */ + package org.neo4j.kernel.api; import org.neo4j.graphdb.Resource; /** * A statement which is a smaller coherent unit of work inside a {@link KernelTransaction}. - * + *

* The main purpose of the statement is to keep resources open for the duration of the statement, and * then close all resources at statement close. - * + *
